import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Data } from '../../context/Userdata' export default function Showpage() { let b = useContext(Data) return ( <>

{b.username}

{mainfunc(e,2)}} value={b.profession} onChange={e=>{b.setprofession(e.target.value)}} placeholder='Profession Here'/>
